item.title: Logging In/Out
item.description: Entry is made restricted. We use Google’s sign-in authentication system so that we can use our existing Google IDs to login. But not all Google users are entertained. Only emails with directi, flock, radix & codechef domains are allowed inside. Others will be shown the doors. All the settings are done using “becandid@directi.com” and it can be changed by visiting here
